discussion.p: , the proposal for adding deduction guides to the standard library, contained a recommendation to use __cpp_lib_deduction_guides as a feature test macro. However, it appears that this feature test macro has been accidentally omitted from the Standard when the paper was applied and probably needs to be added back.
